授業方法:
By the end of this course, students will be able to
1) engage in medium-length conversations using natural English expressions and speech patterns,
2) speak extemporaneously about simple topics,
3) understand native speaker style pronunciation of commonly reduced expressions, and
4) learn how to write short, well-formatted passages in English.

第1回:
Introduction.
I will explain class requirements and course expectations. I will explain the expressions and vocabulary that will be necessary for understanding instructions and how to participate in class Students will engage in small role-plays to improve confidence in their use of classroom English as well as a means of interacting with their peers.
